key.name: show-name
key.summary: Whether to show username or the quit button
key.description: Set to 'true' to show only the username. Set to 'false' to show only the shutdown icon.

key.name: show-avatar
key.summary: Whether to show user picture or not
key.description: Set to 'true' to show the user picture. Set to 'false' to hide the user picture.
